body.description: Dr. Harold Katz created the TheraBreath formulas in 1993 for his own family. That's why TheraBreath Kids Mouthwash contains no artificial dyes, no parabens, and no alcohol. This anticavity mouthwash is vegan, gluten free, and made with certified organic flavor. We believe your child's mouthwash should only contain what's truly needed and nothing else. With that in mind, TheraBreath Kid Mouthwash contains a sodium fluoride active ingredient to help support strong, healthy teeth and reduce the formation of cavities. It's the same sodium fluoride the dentist uses for your child's fluoride treatment. Our alcohol-free formula doesn't burn or irritate and works instantly. We’re so confident in the effectiveness of TheraBreath Oral Rinses that we back them up with our 100% guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. TheraBreath: It's a better mouthwash, satisfaction 100% guaranteed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE this product. It's not only fluoridated so helps prevent decay but it also drastically helps bad breath. No more morning breath. I was worried this wouldn't help but it does. The size is much bigger on Amazon then in store and the cost is the same. We started with grape and now own the watermelon too. My son asked for watermelon and likes that one better I think. He's autistic and adhd and gets hyped up where it can be challenging making sure to get his teeth brushed perfectly. His teeth gets brushed twice daily for a few minutes at a time but with him bouncing around sometimes (not everytime) I worry that I'm not getting a few teeth as well as I need to. I think I do most of the time but this just gives that added peace of mind because he doesn't have to rinse with water after using the mouthwash and it helps overnight while he's asleep. He usually doesn't drink afterwards as we brush his teeth right before bed. Occassionally he'll want some water to drink just before bed and that's okay too. I still have better piece of mind. But the main purpose of this purchase is bad breath and it definitely works for that. He was also given a fluoride treatment to use nightly from the Dentist but she said it didn't have to be used nightly. My son doesn't care for the texture/ taste of it and it's a struggle on some occassions so we manage it maybe once a week. He always needs to rinse with water afterwards anyway which defeats the purpose of the product. He has sensory issues and so he doesn't like a lot of products. Thankfully with the mouthwash he doesn't want or feel the need to rinse afterwards so it works better for us. He looks forward to using the mouthwash. He doesn't have cavities yet (he's 7) and hopefully we can keep it did way, at least as long as possible. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 8 year old has bad breath after brushing so I bought this to use and his breath smells so much better. He says the flavor tastes like grape medicine flavor. He doesn’t seem to mind it though and he isn’t the best at taking meds due to taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: This product really gets the kids encouraged to brush their teeth and take care of their oral hygiene with a routine. Of course I haven’t tried the flavor myself but if my picky kids think it’s good, then it must be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for months now, and when I went to the dentist, my gums were better and she told me to keep it up whatever I’m doing at home because it’s working!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Flavor
reviews.reviewText: I am a whole grown woman with no kids and I absolutely love this product. It has a great grape flavor that isn't super saccharine like many others are. It leave your teeth feeling clean and shiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasted pretty well
reviews.reviewText: my son liked it except it didn't mention minty taste to the grape flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only mouthwash my child actually likes and will use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mouthwash for kids!
reviews.reviewText: I loved this product, it is so mild but effective. Doesn’t have an alcohol burning so my children do not complain and is dentist formulated. The grape flavor was great and there are 2 other options as well! I will definitely recommend this product.
